snippet.title: Capcom Arcade Stadium - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#CapcomArcadeStadium is available now! Start your collection with a free download of 1943 – The Battle of Midway – and make the arcade yourcade by purchasing additional game packs! Each game supports a variety of modern features including save slots, rewind, visual filters, and more! #Capcom #Arcade


🕹️ Download Now: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/capcom-arcade-stadium-switch/
🕹️ More Info: https://www.capcom-unity.com/2021/02/17/capcom-arcade-stadium-brings-32-arcade-classics-to-nintendo-switch-out-now/

--------------------------------------
Teenage Blues

Hangin’ out with friends from school
Skipping class and being cool
We were seventeen that summer
I remember like yesterday
Playing games at the arcade
Nothing could get in our way
We were happy so carefree
Dreams and coins for you and for me

I still get that feeling even now we’re older
Oh that feeling I don’t wanna lose it, my bitter sweet memories

It’s just “teenage blues”
Hesitation and passion, laughter and pain
The same wind is blowing
Gets me back on my feet and going again

DJ on the radio shared the secrets of my soul
All the songs I knew so well
Still my favorite to this day
Missing you in the midnight hour
Wishing that our love could flower
Making tapes to give to you
Hoping that you’ll know I’m true

It’s a shame the days go by so quickly
Time so golden, never gonna lose it, my precious memories

It’s just “teenage blues”
Reaching high with devotion, out of the rain
The same wind is blowing
You know I’d give anything to be there again

Darkness fades to early morning
The night is almost over
Sleepless, take another cup of caffeine, I’ll be okay

It’s just “teenage blues”
Hesitation and passion, laughter and pain
The same wind is blowing
Gets me back on my feet and going again
 “Teenage blues”
Reaching high with devotion, out of the rain
The same wind is blowing
You know I’d give anything to be there again

Composition：Akio Dobashi
Lyrics：Momoko Suzuki / Naomi Tamura
Arrangement：Sho-ta with Tenpack riverside rock'n roll band
--------------------------------------

Discord: https://discord.gg/Capcom
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CapcomUSA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CapcomUSA_
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CapcomUSA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/CapcomUSA/

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
